name: gitlab_get_latest_pipeline
description: Get the latest pipeline for a GitLab project. Returns pipeline id, project_id, and name. Use this tool to check the most recent CI/CD pipeline execution.

project_id.description: The GitLab project ID or URL-encoded path (e.g., 'mygroup/myproject' or '12345'). Required to identify which project's pipeline to retrieve.
The project ID this pipeline belongs to

status.description: The current status of the pipeline (e.g., 'success', 'failed', 'running')

ref.description: The branch or tag name the pipeline ran on
